Getting started

Install dependencies

$ pip install tensorflow
$ pip install keras

Install Ruta

devtools::install_github("fdavidcl/ruta")

Train your first autoencoder

library(magrittr)
library(ruta)

result = iris %>%
  autoencode(input() + dense(2) + output())
